name: Death In Your Dice
storyline: A mysterious figure draws you into the game. Price: death. Executioner: you. You have dice in your hand and the consequences of this game on your shoulders. Act, predict, observe, and above all... cheat? How long will you last before your conscience takes your minds away? How long will you last before you throw away your values? Do you think you are capable of making sacrifices in the name of honor? The time of trial has come. Even if the die has been cast, let your decisions determine you.
summary: Can you outwit fate when your turn comes? From now on, all you care about is the game of dice and its consequences. Observe, investigate, act, defend yourself. Time is ticking away, but death will not wait.
